text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt word and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to give you an update on Amazon Pali
Pali is a service that turns text into
lifelike speech making it easy to add
voice to your website mobile app or
device you can add high-quality male or
female voice output to your video
presentation or online training course
with 47 lifelike voices in 24 languages
to enhance the lifelike experience of
using Amazon Pali voices you can now
easily add a whispered speech effect to
your text to speech output to create
voices that mimic the effect of
whispering you simply use the new
whispered SS ml tag to mark the text
input to be spoken in a hushed voice
this tag can be applied to any of the 47
voices in Polly's text-to-speech
portfolio in addition Amazon Pali now
enables developers to provide speech
synchronized facial animation or karaoke
style word highlighting through the use
of our new speech marks functionality to
add an enhanced visual experience to
your application hi my name is rim when
used in combination with a speech audio
stream speech marks returns a separate
metadata Jason stream which contains
information for sentence and word timing
as well as the appropriate vines which
indicate the specific shape of the mouth
that corresponds with the sound speech
marks enables you to build applications
that take advantage of when particular
sentences words and sounds are being
pronounced for more engaging and natural
customer experience when interacting
with your voice enabled application this
is particularly useful if you have an
application with an animated avatar say
a gaming application or virtual
assistant which requires the ability to
synchronize lips with voice or you are
using poly in an educational environment
highlighting text for enhanced reading
experience you can try both new features
through the Amazon Pali console today
thanks a lot
[Music]
